moqui.basic.LocalizedEntityField.localized: 更新个人信息确认邮件

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Data Source ID
Data Source Type
Because of password errors not creating account with username ${username}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 因密码错误，没有创建账号${username}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Current password incorrect for user ${username}
New Password and New Password Verify do not match
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 两次录入的新密码不匹配

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Password shorter than ${minLength} characters
Password needs ${minDigits} digit/number characters
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 密码需要至少${minDigits}位数字字符

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Password needs ${minOthers} other characters (not letter or digit)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 密码需要至少${minOthers}位其它字符(非字母或数字)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: New password is same as current password
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 新密码不能与当前密码一致

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Found issues with password so not updating
Password incorrect for username ${username}
Password was used in last ${historyLimit} passwords
Password updated for user ${userAccount.username}
Could not find account with username ${username}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 找不到用户名为${username}的账号

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Account with username ${username} does not have an email address
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 用户名为${username}的账号没有设置电子邮箱

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: A reset password was sent by email to ${userAccount.emailAddress}. This password may only be used to change your password. Your current password is still valid.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 重置密码已发送到邮箱${userAccount.emailAddress}，此重置密码仅做修改密码使用。你当前的密码仍然有效。

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: You must change your password before login.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 登录前必须先修改密码

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Can only create initial admin account if there are no UserAccount records
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 仅当没有任何账号时才能创建初始管理员账号

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No search implementation installed, not indexing DataDocuments (see the moqui-elasticsearch component)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 搜索模块未安装，无法索引DataDcouments(请先安装moqui-elasticsearch模块)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No search implementation installed, not putting DataDocument mappings (see the moqui-elasticsearch component)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 搜索模块未安装，无法映射DataDcouments(请先安装moqui-elasticsearch模块)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No search implementation installed, not indexing Wiki Space Pages (see the moqui-elasticsearch component)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 搜索模块未安装，无法索引WiKi页面(请先安装moqui-elasticsearch模块)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No search implementation installed, not searching DataDocuments (see the moqui-elasticsearch component)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 搜索模块未安装，无法搜索DataDocuments(请先安装moqui-elasticsearch模块)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No search implementation installed, not searching DataDocuments by source (see the moqui-elasticsearch component)
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 搜索模块未安装，无法按源数据搜索DataDocuments(请先安装moqui-elasticsearch模块)

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No account found for username ${username}
Authenticate failed for user ${newUserAccount.username} because account is disabled and will not be re-enabled until ${reEnableTime} [DISTMP].
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 账号${newUserAccount.username}已被临时禁用。请在${reEnableTime}之后再试。

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Authenticate failed for user ${newUserAccount.username} because account is disabled and is not schedule to be automatically re-enabled [DISPRM].
Authenticate failed for user [${newUserAccount.username}] because account requires password change [PWDCHG].
Authenticate failed for user ${newUserAccount.username} because password was changed ${wksSinceChange} weeks ago and must be changed every ${changeWeeks} weeks [PWDTIM].
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 账号${newUserAccount.username}的密码上次修改已是${wksSinceChange}星期以前，必须每${changeWeeks}星期修改一次。[DISTMP]

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Username ${username} and/or password incorrect
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 用户名${username} 和/或者 密码错误

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: User ${username} does not have permission ${permission}
User ${principalCollection.primaryPrincipal} is not in role ${roleName}
No EmailServer found for ID [${emailServerId}]
EmailServer [${emailServerId}] has no storeHost
EmailServer [${emailServerId}] has no mailUsername
EmailServer [${emailServerId}] has no mailPassword
No ${storeFolder} folder found
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 找不到邮件主机上的文件夹${storeFolder}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: No EmailTemplate record found for ID [${emailTemplateId}]
No EmailServer record found for EmailTemplate [${emailTemplateId}]
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 邮件模板EmailTemplate[${emailTemplateId}]中定义的邮件服务器未定义

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: SMTP Host is empty for EmailServer [${emailServer.emailServerId}]
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 邮件服务器EmailServer [${emailServer.emailServerId}]设置中的SMTP主机不能为空

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: From address is empty for EmailTemplate [${emailTemplateId}]
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 邮件模板EmailTemplate [${emailTemplateId}]设置中的From地址不能为空

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: File ${filename} already exists.
Wrote ${valuesWritten} documents to file ${filename}
Path ${dirname} is not a directory.
File ${filename} already exists, skipping document ${dataDocumentId}.
Wrote ${valuesWritten} records to file ${filename}
Path ${path} is not a directory.
File ${filename} already exists, skipping entity ${en}.
Wrote ${curValuesWritten} records to file ${filename}
Condition failed for transition [${location}], not running actions or redirecting
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: transition [${location}]中条件未通过, 不能运行actions处理或者redirecting跳转

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Required parameter missing (${pi.name})
Not looking for child file at [${relativePath}] under space root page [${location}] because exists, isFile, etc are not supported
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 因不支持 exists, isFile,等等，未进行在根页面[${location}]下的目录[${relativePath}]查找子文件

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Not looking for child directory at [${relativePath}] under space root page [${location}] because exists, isFile, etc are not supported
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 因不支持 exists, isFile等等，未进行在根页面[${location}]下的目录[${relativePath}]查找子目录

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Error parsing JSON-RPC response for service [${serviceName ?: method}]: ${t.toString()}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 解析服务[${serviceName ?: method}]的JSON-RPC返回结果错误 : ${t.toString()}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: JSON-RPC error with no message, code [${responseMap.error?.code}]
JSON-RPC response was not a object/Map for service [${serviceName ?: method}]: ${jsonObj}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 服务[${serviceName ?: method}]的JSON-RPC的返回不是object或者Map: ${jsonObj}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Value entered (${parameterValue}) failed ${valNode.name} validation: ${t.message}
Field cannot be empty
Value [${pv}] is not a whole (integer) number.
Value [${pv}] is not a decimal number.
Value entered ({0}) could not be converted to a {1}{2,choice,0#|1# using format [}{3}{2,choice,0#|1#]}
